summary:
- **ASX Announcement Type: Exploration Update (Tolmer Silver Discovery)**  
  - Completed expedited soil sampling program over ~1.9km² area at Tolmer silver discovery (Tarcoola Gold Project).  
  - ~380 samples collected; assay results expected September 2025.  
  - Follows expanded 2,882m RC drilling program (results pending).  
  - Previous high-grade silver intersections include 6m @ 4,747 g/t Ag and 14m @ 434 g/t Ag.  

*No other material trading or capital markets information identified.*
